EmailTemplate.description: Case Resolution approval notification is sent when the Reviewer rejects the Case resolution.
EmailTemplate.name: Case Resolution Rejection Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Case Resolution Rejection Notification
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hi {!Case.OwnerFullName}, The resolution of the case '{!Case.Subject}' has been rejected and marked as Invalid by the reviewer. Please resolve the issue. Following is the link to view the case {!Case.Link} Thank You Salesforce Team
